Amazon is all in on games. At Amazon Game Studios, we believe the evolution that began with arcade communities a quarter at a time, growing to the live streams and esports of today, will continue to a future where everyone is a gamer and every gamer can create, compete, collaborate and connect with others at massive scales. Our game teams in Seattle and Irvine are developing games that harness the power of AWS and Twitch to create bold, new game experiences.Please check our website to learn more:  https://games.amazon.com/

Since 1985 SunPower has been leading global solar innovation. SunPower® solar panels consistently deliver more energy and long-term peace of mind with the highest performing solar power systems available. SunPower is the solar energy choice of more homeowners and businesses around the world.At SunPower, we believe that as a leader of clean energy technology, we have a critical role to play in addressing our planet’s social and environmental challenges. We do this by producing the most efficient and reliable products on the planet. Supporting local, national and international policies helps make solar (SunPower) the energy choice of people worldwide.Responsibilities include full life-cycle recruiting and talent acquisition in a variety of disciplines, including but not limited to: Power Plant Design, Construction/O&M, Supply Chain, Systems Equipment, R&D, Product Management & Marketing. Please visit http://us.sunpowercorp.com/about/careers/find-a-position/ to learn more about career opportunities!At SunPower we are seeking talented people to join us in building a global clean energy future.

Recruiting top talent for financial and digital creative industries.Specialties: Front End Developers, Python Developers, Senior .NET Developers, Senior Web/Mobile Developers, Front End Test Engineers, Cassandra Database Engineers, Business Analysts, UX/UI Designers, Interactive Designers, Web/Print Production Artists, Project Managers.

Adaptive Insights, the leading cloud business analytics solution, empowering finance and management teams to automate budgeting, forecasting, reporting, consolidations, and data visualization. We fundamentally transform business management by enabling business leaders to easily create financial and operating plans, monitor performance in real-time, and report on and analyze results.  An alternative to manual spreadsheets and legacy enterprise software, Adaptive Insights is (1) affordable, with a 75% lower TCO; (2) easy to use, for everyone; and (3) rapidly deployable, going live in just weeks.  We allow managers to cut cycle times by 90%+, reduce errors and risk, visualize KPIs and metrics, improve analysis, enhance collaboration, and ultimately drive better business decisions. We are the clear leader in cloud corporate performance management (CPM) and business intelligence (BI): 2,300+ customers in 65 countries worldwide  400+ partners, including NetSuite, which OEMs Adaptive 90% annual growth in new subscriptions #1 fastest growing CPM software company on the Deloitte Fast 500  #1 in customer satisfaction  Adaptive Insights is an ideal fit for midsized companies and large corporations, including Boston Scientific, The Container Store, Siemens, Philips, Bridgestone, Stanford University, Toyota, and Vail Resorts.

Founded in 1970 with locations throughout California and into Texas, Nelson ranks among the largest independent staffing companies in the United States. Regularly recognized as one of the “Top 10 Best Staffing Firms to Work For,” in 2012, Nelson was also honored as Best Job Placement Service by NorthBay Biz magazine and one of the Best Places to Work in the Bay Area by the San Francisco Business Times and the San Jose/Silicon Valley Business Journal. Embracing the values of excellence, innovation, empathy, and integrity when interacting with clients and employees alike, Nelson holds itself to a high standard.

* Full-cycle recruitment from sourcing, screening, scheduling interviews and extending offers.* Recruit candidates through professional and social networks, job postings, Boolean searches, onsite and offsite open interviews, referrals and proactive searches.* Responsible for Client relationship management.* Manage the hiring process for Game Industry Clients contingent workforce and direct hire: pre-screening, interviews, testing and background checks.* Client specific recruitment and personalized screening processes.

Senior Manager of Operations, Professional Services - PMP at Adaptive Insights
January 20, 2015, Paul was a client of Cody’s

Cody recruited me for Adaptive Insights and although I was originally not looking to make a move her excitement about the company and opportunity made be take note.  She was very helpful during the interviewing process and was able to get all of the answers to my questions answered so that I could make an informed decision.  I was glad to see that the positive picture she painted of the team was right on.  My decision to move forward with Adaptive Insights was easy once my interview process was complete and an offer was extended.  I have been contacted by many recruiters in the past but it was the follow up and diligent efforts of Cody that allowed me my current role.  I would recommend Cody for anyone looking for a good recruiter.
